title: gurusVami padam
sahitya:
gurusvAmi padam paNi manamE sadgurusvAmi pada paNi manamE


anupallavi

  aruL kUrndu manamaruL nIkki nALum parivuDan daraNiyOr uyya vazhi kATTum


caraNam    gAnam sheidE jAnaki lOlanai kanindu tudittu kazhal paNindu
 mOnat-tavattOr nADum mOhana rUpam kaNDa dhyAna nirata shrI tyAgarAja sad
